isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Opening Scuff Plate and Seat Belt Retractor Cover on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

note.para: This procedure applies to all front door openings for all cabs and models and rear door openings for crew cab models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 100 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door opening scuff plate (Item 2) on cab floor and install four torx head screws (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install push-in fastener (Item 3) securing seat belt retractor cover (Item 4) to seat belt retractor assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover.
